attributes.action: Bring pressure to bear on the Lee Valley Regional Park Authority to provide a proper and suitable club house facility for golfers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A very popular public golf course beautifully designed and cared for is totally 'let down' by very poor and very basic 'before and after golf' amenities. First class staff performing to a high standard are betrayed by 'wooly thinking' at the highest levels. Because regular users are loyal to the course because of its high standard the 'powers that be' obviously think no action is needed. Shame on you LVRPA!
